definitions.definition: A person who is not susceptible to infection by a particular disease

definitions.example: As a diplomat, you are immune from prosecution.

definitions.definition: (usually with "to") Protected by inoculation, or due to innate resistance to pathogens.
definitions.example: I am immune to chicken pox.
Alas, he was immune to my charms.

definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the immune system.
definitions.example: We examined the patient's immune response.
